sentences.english: The thickeners are the main additives of water-base fracturing liquids.
sentences.chinese: 增稠劑是用於水基壓裂液的最主要添加劑。

sentences.english: This paper studied the influence of different thickeners on the shape and flavor of the carrot paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了不同增稠劑對胡蘿蔔紙成型及口感的影響。

sentences.english: The experimental result shows that POA possesses obvious thickening effects.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果表明POA增稠劑有明顯的增稠性。

sentences.english: It may also serves as a softener or densifier in foodstuff industry.
sentences.chinese: 它也可作爲軟化劑或在食品工業增稠劑。

sentences.english: Most of the thickeners are of plant origin.
sentences.chinese: 大部分增稠劑來源於植物。
共乳化劑及乳液增稠劑。

sentences.english: Ethyl cinnamate can be used as a fixed essence incense and thickening agent used.
sentences.chinese: 肉桂酸乙酯可用作香精的定香劑和增稠劑使用。
